participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

ksads_aud_raw_1218_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months.You found that you need to drink a lot more to get the same high. | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_aud_raw_1203_t.Description: Since you have been drinking regularly, have you found that you need to drink a lot more to get the same high? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_aud_raw_1204_t.Description: Was there ever a time that you spent a great deal of time either trying to obtain alcohol, drinking alcohol, or hung over? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_aud_raw_1206_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months. ksads_aud_raw_1207_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months. You often drank more than you planned. | 0=No; 1=Yes

Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months. ksads_aud_raw_1210_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months. You did something dangerous while drinking. | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_aud_raw_1211_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months.You threw up or had an accident and hurt yourself when drunk. | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_aud_raw_1212_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months.Your drinking made your moods notably worse. | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_aud_raw_1213_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months. You felt preoccupied by the desire to drink. | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_aud_raw_1214_t.Description: You endorsed the symptoms listed below as occurring at some time in the past. Please note if these symptoms were present in the past 0-3 months and also if they were present in the past 4-12 months.Your drinking time replaced the time you used to spend doing your usual activities, like sports, hobbies, spending time with family or friends, or work or school. | 0=No; 1=Yes

You often thought about wanting to cut back on your alcohol use. | 0=No; 1=Yes
